formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'MeetMeChannelAdmin' =-
[Synopsis] MeetMe conference Administration (channel specific)
[Description] MeetMeChannelAdmin(channel,command): Run admin command for a specific channel in any coference. 'k' -- Kick the specified user out of the conference he is in 'm' -- Unmute the specified user 'M' -- Mute the specified user

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
